Entries.eventSeen_34_memory_oneweek: I've been teaching Jas and Vincent about Dwarfish Archaeology...#$b#Jas is curious about the origins of the Dwarfs... but Vincent is mainly interested in dwarfish weapons!$h
Entries.Mon8: I'm eager to move out. It's such a burden to be worrying about mum all the time.#$e#I want her to be happy, but I can't stay here forever... you know?$s
Entries.Wed: We don't have a school here but I'm doing my best to give Vincent and Jas a proper education.#$e#Every child deserves a chance to be successful.#$e#Jas is very good at maths and reading. Vincent is good at... well, he has an active imagination!
Entries.Fri8: I shouldn't complain so much about housework... some people in the world are really struggling, and here I am complaining about doing dishes...$s
Entries.Sat2: $d Joja#Things changed a lot after the JojaMart went up. It's been really bad for Pierre's shop. Mum loves JojaMart, though. The prices are cheap, so she can afford a lot more there than she ever could at Pierre's.|Mum's been complaining ever since JojaMart closed down. I think it's good for her, though. Maybe she'll drink less Joja Cola now.
Entries.event_old2: You're right, we shouldn't ignore the reality of ageing.$u#$b#I guess the sooner we come to terms with our mortality, the more time we can spend really living in the here-and-now.$u
Entries.summer_Mon4: $d cc#Thanks for fixing the community centre back up. I guess you're kind of a town hero.|Hello, @. It's nice to see you're doing well.
Entries.fall_Thu6: Mum doesn't take very good care of herself...$u#$e#I worry about her.$u
Entries.winter_Thu: Oh... hi. You want to talk?$u#$e#If you find any interesting artefacts or minerals, Gunther will gladly display them in the museum.#$e#He told me he has special gifts for people who donate.
Entries.winter_Mon: On the 25th we'll be having the Feast of the Winter Star. It's one of my favourite events.#$e#It's supposed to be a time to show gratitude for all the good things in your life... but for most people it's just a time to relax and exchange gifts.
